collectible.title: Wii Remote
collectible.subtitle: Next-generation REVOLUTIONARY motion controls!
collectible.text: The Wii Remote, also known as the Wiimote, is the primary controller for the Nintendo Wii.
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Wii Fit Trainer.

collectible.title: Wii Nunchuk
collectible.subtitle: Can't play Wii Sports boxing without it!
collectible.text: Used in conjunction with the standard Wii Remote, certain games need the Nunchuk controller for additional control options.
collectible.unlock: Follow along to Wii Fit Trainer's instructions during the duration of your forfeit.

collectible.title: Wii Balance Board
collectible.subtitle: The ultimate Wii fitness accessory!
collectible.text: Check your Body Mass Index (BMI), see your Wii Fit Age and keep tabs on your daily progress towards a healthier lifestyle. Unlike the usual balance board for exercise, it does not rock but instead tracks the user's center of balance.
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Wii Fit Trainer and three other "athletic" tagged characters.

collectible.title: Wii Fit Tank Top
collectible.subtitle: Official look of a gym expert!
collectible.text: Wear Wii Fit Trainer's tank top for a sporty but functional look.
collectible.unlock: Witness Wii Fit Trainer lose a round in her default outfit.

collectible.title: Sweaty Sports Bra
collectible.subtitle: Great for upper body support!
collectible.text: Wii Fit Trainer's sports bra gifted to you after a particularly heated workout session.
collectible.unlock: Witness Wii Fit Trainer lose 4 rounds in her default outfit.
